Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers counselling by trained counsellors to bereaved people who have lost their partner, parents, child or someone close to them. Runs training courses in bereavement counselling. Runs Stepping Stones (social group). Offers individual counselling by appointment. Home visits can be arranged. Also has a bereavement support group, please contact for details. Self referral for people aged over 16. Children and young people aged under 16 years should be referred by whoever is legally responsible for them (with signed consent).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Alternate Tuesdays at 2pm (Stepping Stones), please contact before attending
